name: Tier 1
description: Tier 1 is a new take on a 2D space combat simulator. Dogfight in a fast and nimble space fighter, or control interplanetary space using a large lumbering space ship.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8.1 Memory: 4 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space
